Method Detail

commandComplete

void commandComplete(ImapCommand command,
                     java.lang.String tag)
                     throws java.io.IOException
Writes a standard tagged OK response on completion of a command. Response is writen as: 
        a01 OK COMMAND_NAME completed.

Parameters:
command - The ImapCommand which was completed.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

commandComplete

void commandComplete(ImapCommand command,
                     java.lang.String responseCode,
                     java.lang.String tag)
                     throws java.io.IOException
Writes a standard tagged OK response on completion of a command, with a response code (eg READ-WRITE) Response is writen as: 
        a01 OK [responseCode] COMMAND_NAME completed.

Parameters:
command - The ImapCommand which was completed.
responseCode - A string response code to send to the client.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

commandFailed

void commandFailed(ImapCommand command,
                   java.lang.String reason,
                   java.lang.String tag)
                   throws java.io.IOException
Writes a standard NO response on command failure, together with a descriptive message. Response is writen as: 
        a01 NO COMMAND_NAME failed. <reason>

Parameters:
command - The ImapCommand which failed.
reason - A message describing why the command failed.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

commandFailed

void commandFailed(ImapCommand command,
                   java.lang.String responseCode,
                   java.lang.String reason,
                   java.lang.String tag)
                   throws java.io.IOException
Writes a standard NO response on command failure, together with a descriptive message. Response is writen as: 
        a01 NO [responseCode] COMMAND_NAME failed. <reason>

Parameters:
command - The ImapCommand which failed.
responseCode - The Imap response code to send.
reason - A message describing why the command failed.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

commandError

void commandError(java.lang.String message,
                  java.lang.String tag)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Writes a standard BAD response on command error, together with a descriptive message. Response is writen as: 
        a01 BAD <message>

Parameters:
message - The descriptive error message.

void okResponse(java.lang.String responseCode,
                java.lang.String message)
                throws java.io.IOException
Writes an untagged OK response, with the supplied response code, and an optional message.

Parameters:
responseCode - The response code, included in [].
message - The message to follow the []
Throws:
java.io.IOException

untaggedNoResponse

void untaggedNoResponse(java.lang.String displayMessage,
                        java.lang.String responseCode)
                        throws java.io.IOException
Writes an untagged NO response. Indicates that a warning. The command may still complete sucessfully.

Parameters:
displayMessage - message for display, not null
responseCode - response code or null when there is no response code
Throws:
java.io.IOException

startEnvelope

void startEnvelope(java.lang.String date,
                   java.lang.String subject,
                   boolean prefixWithName)
                   throws java.io.IOException
Starts a FETCH ENVELOPE production.

Parameters:
date - envelope date, or null for NIL
subject - envelope subject, or null for NIL
prefixWithName - whether ENVELOPE should be prefixed
Throws:
java.io.IOException
See Also:
#endEnvelope(String, String)} must be called

name - personal name, or null for NIL

upperCaseAscii

ImapResponseComposer upperCaseAscii(java.lang.String message)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
Appends the given message after conversion to upper case. The message may be assumed to be ASCII encoded. Conversion of characters MUST NOT be performed according to the current locale but as per ASCII.

Parameters:
message - ASCII encoded, not null
Returns:
self, not null
Throws:
java.io.IOException

quoteUpperCaseAscii

ImapResponseComposer quoteUpperCaseAscii(java.lang.String message)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
Appends the given message after conversion to upper case. The message may be assumed to be ASCII encoded. Conversion of characters MUST NOT be performed according to the current locale but as per ASCII.

Parameters:
message - ASCII encoded, not null
Returns:
self, not null
Throws:
java.io.IOException

nillableQuote

ImapResponseComposer nillableQuote(java.lang.String message)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
Appends the given message after appropriate quoting (when not null) or NIL (when null).

Parameters:
message - possibly null
Returns:
self, not null
Throws:
java.io.IOException

nillableQuotes

ImapResponseComposer nillableQuotes(java.lang.String[] quotes)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
Composes a sequence of nillables quotes. When messages are null, a single NIL is appended. Otherwise, each element is appended in sequence as per nillableQuote(String).

Parameters:
quotes - messages, possibly null
Returns:
self, not null
Throws:
java.io.IOException

nillableComposition

ImapResponseComposer nillableComposition(java.lang.String masterQuote,
                                         java.lang.String[] quotes)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
Composes a nillable composition. When the master quote is null, NIL is appended. Otherwise, a parenthesized list is created starting with the master quote. When the quotes are null, NIL is appended only. Otherwise, each element is appended in sequence as per nillableQuote(String)

Parameters:
quote - master, possibly null
quotes - quotes, possibly null
Returns:
self, not null
Throws:
java.io.IOException

skipNextSpace

void skipNextSpace()
                   throws java.io.IOException
Throws:
java.io.IOException
